name: chrome-etc
description: Chrome extension for enhanced GitHub experience

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-static
scripts.test: npm run test:fullwidth && npm run test:mermaid && npm run test:comment-fold
scripts.test:fullwidth: npm run build && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.test.json test/test-fullwidth.ts
scripts.test:mermaid: npm run build && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.test.json test/test-mermaid.ts
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip *
